i used to do this, and i still struggle with correctly apologizing. whenever you need to apologize just say "im sorry" and make sure theres no ifs or self detriment in the same statement. 

good examples: "im sorry i hurt your feelings" "im sorry i hurt you, i feel bad about it and i want to fix it." 

bad examples: "im sorry IF i hurt your feelings," "im sorry i hurt your feelings, im a horrible person." 

i had to teach this to myself and its really hard. anyone else lmk if this info is wrong
